name: Pat-Pat Alpaca!
description:
Get cozy and enjoy a small game about alpacas! These cute creatures need love, care and attention, as well as food and to keep themselves warm. Shear them to get wool, and use it to craft useful items. Grow your barn by collecting hearts and purchasing more land.

How to Play:
  • Right click on alpacas to shear them
  • Left click on alpacas to open info panel
  • Hover over resources to collect
  • Pet them to increase love

Pat-Pat Alpaca! is a game submitted to the Buddy Up Jam : Winter 2023. The theme is "soft" so we based the art style and gameplay around soft alpacas where you collect wool and love and take care of them. 

This game is still in development and we would love to hear any feedback or ideas to improve gameplay in the future! 🎨Art & Design:
